name: Linear
description: Modern issue tracking for software teams with cycles and projects

fields.name: api_key
fields.label: API Key
fields.help: Generate at Linear Settings > API > Personal API keys

fields.name: team_key
fields.label: Team Key
fields.help: Team identifier (e.g., ENG, PROD). Find it in your Linear URL

fields.name: commit_prefix
fields.label: Commit Prefix
fields.help: Prefix for commit messages (default: team key)

post_install: Run 'rg linear teams' to list available teams
Run 'rg linear issues' to see your active issues
Run 'rg linear status' to verify connection
